description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
species of individuals participating in the study – chimpanzee
set of trials per participant – 1 is for the session for each participant increased by 1 with every session
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
condition the participant was presented in a given session - chimpanzee_helps / control-chimpanzee_pulls_food / experimenter_helps / control-experimenter_pulls_food
time in seconds the food was placed in front of the participant (but not accessible) – 7 /15
whether the stooge(conspecific) is present inside the booth (1) or the booth is empty(0)
start of the specific event (seconds from the time the system (camera) was turned on)
time in seconds indicating time point of each event within a trial – 0 means that the stooge was not perfectly present in front of the screen
step by step events occurred within each trial – e.g. first_light_on / remove_occluder etc.
whether the participant attempted to help or not
overall number of the session – 1 refers to the every first day of the experiments increased by 1 with every day
type of food presented to the participant with an apparatus that delivered food if a rope was pulled – b (banana) / (grape)
